MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G67 area of Cumbernauld, affecting properties in Braesburn Court. It will be necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 6pm due to repairs required to our underground electricity network outside 7 Braesburn Court and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5:25pm on Wednesday, 18 November 2020
